name: ATV Fever
synopsis: Enjoy the great mix of environments and terrains, diverse vehicles and formats. Aggressive and skilful driving is needed as players negotiate their way through numerous off-road and mountain venues in a quest to reach the winner’s circle and climb to the top of the driver standings. Nine authentic all-terrain vehicles are at your disposal as you battle the world’s best riders for circuit supremacy. Be the top ranked rider in the world! Be all about “The Fever.”
